# CPTimeRemainingColor.default

**Case**

The system default color.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Discussion

The color is white when the map template’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPMapTemplate/tripEstimateStyle] is [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTripEstimateStyle/dark], and black when the style is [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPTripEstimateStyle/light].

## Colors

- **CPTimeRemainingColor.green**: A shade of green.
- **CPTimeRemainingColor.orange**: A shade of orange.
- **CPTimeRemainingColor.red**: A shade of red.
title: CPTimeRemainingColor.default
